item.title: Gobbles OpenBSD RCE
item.author: sales[at]medeis[dot]io (medeis)
item.description: Reflecting on the 2002 Gobbles Hack of OpenBSD project: Cybersecurity Then and Now In 2002, Theo De Raadt, the leader of the OpenBSD project, was hit by a remote code execution (RCE) attack by a hacker collective known as Gobbles.

item.description: Hacking is all about breaking assumptions and making the impossible possible. It’s the art of imagination and infinite possibilities.
